Your Data is Trapped. Your Teams are Waiting.

The Executive Pain

Strategic decisions are delayed by weeks because KPIs must be manually reconciled across conflicting Excel sheets, HIS systems, and ERP databases.

The Organizational Pain

Non-technical staff—HR, Procurement, Head Nurses—cannot access data directly. They submit "tickets" to IT and wait 5+ days for simple reports.

"A Nursing Director waits 5 days for a 'Staff Overtime vs. Patient Volume' report, delaying critical rostering decisions."

The Regulatory Wall

Public cloud AI (ChatGPT, Claude, etc.) is banned for patient data under PDPL. Hospitals are left with rigid, legacy tools that can't keep up.

0%

of Saudi firms cite data privacy concerns as the #1 barrier to AI adoption

Sovereign Self-Service Intelligence

An on-premises AI analyst available 24/7 to your entire organization.

1

Ask Your Data

Natural language queries for any authorized user—from CEO to Head Nurse. No SQL. No tickets. Just answers.

2

100% On-Premises

Air-gapped deployment. Your data never leaves your facility. Full PDPL and NCA compliance.

3

Universal Ingestion

Connects to Excel, SQL, Oracle, HIS, ERP, HL7/FHIR—in minutes, not months.

Command Center View

Real-time strategic correlations and KPI dashboards for C-Suite executives.

"Ask Your Data" Chat

A secure natural language interface for operational users across all departments.

From Question to Insight in 3 Steps

1

Connect

ANDEXA ingests your existing data sources—Excel, SQL, Oracle, HIS, ERP, HL7/FHIR. No migration required. No disruption to your current systems.

Excel SQL Oracle HIS ERP
2

Ask

Users query data in plain Arabic or English.

“ Show ICU bed occupancy vs. staffing levels this week
“ What are the top 5 consumable costs in Emergency this month?
3

Act

Receive instant reports, interactive dashboards, and exportable analytics. Make decisions in minutes, not weeks.

100% On-Premises

Deployed entirely within your data center or private cloud. No external dependencies.

Zero Data Egress

Your data never leaves your facility. Ever. Air-gapped architecture ensures complete isolation.

PDPL Compliant

Native alignment with Saudi Arabia's Personal Data Protection Law. Patient data stays protected.

NCA ECC Aligned

Designed to meet the National Cybersecurity Authority's Essential Cybersecurity Controls.

Role-Based Access Control

Granular permissions ensure users only access data they're authorized to see. Full audit trails.

Built in Saudi Arabia, for Saudi Arabia

ANDEXA was designed from the ground up to meet the unique requirements of Saudi healthcare:

Arabic-First NLP — Natural language processing optimized for Arabic queries and reports

Full Data Sovereignty — Your data stays in the Kingdom, always

Vision 2030 Alignment — Supporting the National Transformation Program's digital health goals

Local Expertise — Built by a team that understands Saudi healthcare regulations and workflows

Frequently Asked Questions

Typical deployment takes 2-4 weeks, including data connector configuration and user training. We can have a proof-of-concept running in days.

ANDEXA connects to virtually any structured data source: Excel, SQL databases, Oracle, HIS/EHR systems, ERP platforms, HL7/FHIR feeds, and REST APIs.

Yes. ANDEXA is designed for PDPL (Personal Data Protection Law) compliance and NCA ECC (Essential Cybersecurity Controls) alignment. Data never leaves your premises.

No. ANDEXA uses natural language—users simply type questions in Arabic or English. If you can send a text message, you can use ANDEXA.

ANDEXA deploys 100% on-premises or in your private cloud. There is zero data egress. Role-based access control ensures users only see authorized data. Full audit logging is included.

We offer annual licensing with unlimited queries—no per-token fees. Contact us for a quote based on your organization's needs.

Yes. ANDEXA complements existing dashboards (Tableau, Power BI) by adding natural language query capabilities and automating report generation.
